column5: I've noticed a trend on this website & others.. the "Classified Ads" are being inter-ferred with peoples opinions on the item! How tacky is that?
Almost as tacky as random pictures and youtube videos in almost every thread.
If you are talking about the 16' for sale and my comments, feel free to PM me.
I'm talkin' bout all the mouthpieces that interfere! If the shoe fits..shove it!
Hum, so rules don't apply?  "If this area is used for your first post, it will be deleted" so no, your little cinderella shoe doesn't fit...

PM from Danbo to me:  So, Danbo can send PM's to others, but has chosen not to be able to recieve them. Why am I not surprised?   I am beginning to think that Danbo is horrible at grammar/typing because he never says anything. Just pictures and links. Either that, or its a representation of his mental capacity.  Hows your bike running? Get a bell of the handlebars yet?
OK... thats enough.....  Maybe we should disable  comments in the classifieds???
